x264.pipeline: -thread_queue_size 1024 -rtsp_transport tcp -f rtsp -r 25 -i __ADDR__ -c:v libx264 -keyint_min 60 -g 60 -preset veryfast -tune zerolatency -an -f mp4 __FILENAME__

x264.segments.pipeline: -thread_queue_size 1024 -rtsp_transport tcp -f rtsp -r 25 -i __ADDR__ -c:v libx264 -keyint_min 60 -g 60 -preset veryfast -tune zerolatency -an -f segment -segment_time 1 %03d-__FILENAME__
